resources.string: Don\'t have an account?Sign up now
Q1.How do I know my order is confirmed?
A1.A notification will pop up in your device using which you have ordered once your order is successfully placed.
A2.At Foodies we strive to add value to your business.We understand the challenges you face on a daily basis in sourcing the best quality packaging material.
A3.We only list the products which have passed our tests and are best suitable for delivery.We have negotiated rates with our distributors exclusive for Foodies
Q4.Do i have to register before placing an order?
A4.Yes it is necessary for you to register ,only after that you can login and place an order.
